Name: Armed Forces of the Federated Commonwealth
Details: The Armed Forces of the Federated Commonwealth (AFFC) is the military arm of the Federated Commonwealth. As the Federated Commonwealth was a union of the Federated Suns and the Lyran Commonwealth, the AFFC was formed from the Armed Forces of the Federated Suns and the Lyran Commonwealth Armed Forces. At its peak, the AFFC represented the largest single military since the original Star League Defense Force.
